pages.title: New Ground Jiu Jitsu Sherman Oaks | All No-Gi Academy Led by 10th Planet Black Belt Mike Frausto
pages.metaDescription:
Train Jiu Jitsu at New Ground ‚Äî Sherman Oaks‚Äô premier all No-Gi academy. 
Led by 10th Planet Black Belt Mike Frausto, we help adults and kids build 
confidence, fitness, and real self-defense skills in a welcoming, ego-free 
environment. Book your first class today.

Oaks, CA. Learn world-class grappling, self-defense, and discipline in a 
welcoming, ego-free environment. All levels welcome‚Äîstart your free trial

paragraphs: New Ground Jiu Jitsu offers premiere no gi jiu jitsu training for all adults, from recreational practitioners to avid competitors. Choose from any of our 3 class types: Fundamentals, All Levels, and Advanced training. Learn more about what you can look forward too.

Our kids program is created for three age groups: 4-5, 5-7, and 8-13 years old. We train our kids in a fun filled environment that utilizes jiu jitsu based movements to warm up, along with exciting and challenging games to learn the techniques and positions.
Email: hello@newgroundjiujitsu.com
4617 Van Nuys Blvd, Unit BSherman Oaks, CA 91405

h3: How to Schedule your Child‚Äôs Free Trial:

paragraphs: At our academy, we offer a kids jiu jitsu program designed to help children develop physical fitness, mental resilience, and valuable life skills in a safe and supportive environment. Jiu jitsu is more than just a martial art‚Äîit's a tool for empowering kids to grow into confident, respectful, and disciplined individuals.

Student-to-Coach Ratio: We prioritize individualized attention to ensure every child receives the guidance they need. As the program grows, so does our kids coaching staff. Ensuring closely monitored progress, personalized feedback, and maintaining a safe learning environment.

Progressive Curriculum: Our program is structured to help kids build their skills step by step, from foundational movements to advanced techniques. We use a clear progression system to keep students motivated, engaged, and excited to achieve their next milestones.

Positive Environment: At our academy, every child matters. We foster an inclusive community where kids of all ages, sizes, and skill levels feel welcomed and supported. We focus on building friendships and teamwork alongside technical skills.

Safe and Clean Facility: The safety and well-being of our students are a top priority. Our academy is equipped with high-quality mats, and we adhere to rigorous hygiene standards to provide a clean and secure training space.
Mini Grounders | 4-5 yo
Little Grounders Level 1 & Level 2 | 5-7 yo
Super Grounders Level 1 & Level Intermediate| 8-13 yo
Monday | 4 PM Littles Grounders & 5 PM Super Grounders
Tuesday | 4 PM Mini Grounders & 5 PM Advance Grounders
Wednesday | 4 PM Littles Grounders & 5 PM Super Grounders
Thursday | 4 PM Mini Grounders
Saturday | 10:30 AM Mini & Littles Grounders, 11:30 AM Super Grounders
1.Determine trial time based on child‚Äôs age group:
Mini Grounders (4-5yo) - 4pm or 10:30am
Little Grounders (5-7yo) - 4pm or 10:30am
Super Grounders (8-13yo) - 5pm or 11:30am
2. Select the Date & Time for your trial
3. Check your email for a trial booking confirmation and details
4. Call or email us for any changes regarding your trial booking
Interested in your kids joining Jiu Jitsu? Fill out our questionnaire below and one of our team members will reach out to you!

pages.title: About New Ground Jiu Jitsu | No-Gi Jiu Jitsu Academy in Sherman Oaks ‚Äî New Ground Jiu Jitsu
pages.metaDescription:
Learn about New Ground Jiu Jitsu ‚Äî Sherman Oaks‚Äô all No-Gi academy led by 
10th Planet Black Belt Mike Frausto. Discover our mission, culture, and how 
we‚Äôre redefining Jiu Jitsu for everyone.
paragraphs: With over 16 years of Jiu Jitsu training and 12 years of coaching, Coach Lobes built New Ground Jiu Jitsu to be Los Angeles‚Äô premier No-Gi academy ‚Äî a place rooted in community, technical excellence, and the love for the art.

What started as a dream to create something different ‚Äî an environment where beginners feel supported and experienced grapplers stay challenged ‚Äî has grown into one of the most exciting academies in the San Fernando Valley.

Before founding New Ground, Coach Lobes spent years immersed in MMA and Jiu Jitsu, coaching at a well-known local academy in the Valley. His deep passion for teaching and the 10th Planet system led him to pursue plans for opening a 10th Planet location near Thousand Oaks, CA.
But life had other plans.

When those plans fell through, Lobes packed up and moved to Seattle, Washington, with a new goal ‚Äî to help launch 10th Planet Seattle and train alongside one of the best black belts in the world. Then the pandemic hit, and the world shut down.

Even with gyms closed, the drive to teach never faded. Back in Los Angeles, a former student reached out for private coaching. Training began in a one-bedroom apartment, then moved to a garage, where classes filled faster than space allowed.
In just three months, word spread ‚Äî and New Ground Jiu Jitsu officially opened its doors on July 1, 2021.
From those humble beginnings, the academy quickly grew into a thriving community built on discipline, respect, and camaraderie.

Today, New Ground Jiu Jitsu stands proudly as part of Jiu Jitsu‚Äôs modern resurgence, especially in the No-Gi grappling scene. Every class reflects the same passion that started in that tiny apartment ‚Äî a dedication to helping students grow both on and off the mats.

Whether you‚Äôre a complete beginner or an experienced grappler, New Ground offers a place to challenge yourself, make new connections, and experience the best of No-Gi Jiu Jitsu in a welcoming, ego-free environment.
üëâ Book your first class today and become part of the movement
Email: hello@newgroundjiujitsu.com
4617 Van Nuys Blvd, Unit BSherman Oaks, CA 91405

pages.title: 6 Week Beginner's Program ‚Äî New Ground Jiu Jitsu

paragraphs: REGISTRATION OPENS DECEMBER 8TH
PROGRAM STARTS JANUARY 21ST

Our 6-week program is designed specifically for newcomers, with a guided training method that takes the guesswork out of learning Jiu Jitsu. Each class builds on the last, focusing on core techniques, proper movement, and foundational skills‚Äîso you never feel lost or overwhelmed. With step-by-step coaching and a supportive environment, you'll gain confidence, improve fitness, and develop real self-defense skills from day one.
6 WEEKS of training, 2X PER WEEK, 60 MINUTES per training session.
You will receive our FULL UNIFORM, consisting of a RASHGUARD and GRAPPLING SHORTS.
You‚Äôll need something to carry all of your new gear and prepare for training. Included, will be a CUSTOM TOTE BAG + a CUSTOM WATER BOTTLE.
A 6 WEEK COMPREHENSIVE WORKBOOK will be provided with every weeks‚Äô lesson laid out for you and broken into easily digestible steps.
An ACCOUNTABILITY COACH FOR 6 WEEKS, ensuring you‚Äôre staying on task with training and retaining all of the new information for a better understanding.
CERTIFICATE OF COMPLETION + a SPECIAL MEMBER RATE, should you choose to continue your journey in Jiu Jitsu and get the full experience of a martial artist.
Solo Movements & Positions
Below are short examples of week 1 material
Breakfalls & Punch Block Series
Below are short examples of week 2 material.
‚Ä¢ Full Uniform, Rashguard + Shorts
‚Ä¢ Custom Tote Bag + Water Bottle
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive 6 Week Workbook
‚Ä¢ Accountability Coach
‚Ä¢ Certificate of Completion
‚Ä¢ Special Member Rate

Not at all. This program is specifically designed for beginners of all ages, body types, and fitness levels. Our focus is on learning technique, building confidence, and helping you move at your own pace ‚Äî no experience necessary.

No. This 6-week program is technique-focused, meaning you‚Äôll spend time learning the core movements, positions, and submissions of Jiu Jitsu without any live sparring. Everything is cooperative and beginner-friendly.

We provide a full uniform (no-gi) as part of the program. Just wear something comfortable when you arrive, and we‚Äôll get you set up. Bring a water bottle, flip flops, and be ready to move barefoot on the mat.

That‚Äôs completely normal ‚Äî most beginners feel the same way. We‚Äôve created a welcoming, ego-free environment where everyone is learning together. You‚Äôll be surrounded by other first-timers and coaches who are here to support you.

Class sizes are kept small to ensure personalized instruction. This program will be limited to 16 students total. Each class includes multiple dedicated coaches and who will work closely with you to help you understand the techniques step by step.

Once you complete the program, you‚Äôll have a strong technical foundation and a better understanding of whether Jiu Jitsu is right for you. If you choose to continue, we offer special membership rates for graduates and help you transition smoothly into our all-levels curriculum.
Email: hello@newgroundjiujitsu.com
4617 Van Nuys Blvd, Unit BSherman Oaks, CA 91405

New Ground Jiu Jitsu offers premiere no gi jiu jitsu training for all adults, from recreational practitioners to avid competitors. Choose from any of our 3 class types: Fundamentals, All Levels, and Advanced training. Learn more about what you can look forward too.

Our kids program is created for three age groups: 4-5, 5-7, and 8-13 years old. We train our kids in a fun filled environment that utilizes jiu jitsu based movements to warm up, along with exciting and challenging games to learn the techniques and positions.

Student-to-Coach Ratio: We prioritize individualized attention to ensure every child receives the guidance they need. As the program grows, so does our kids coaching staff. Ensuring closely monitored progress, personalized feedback, and maintaining a safe learning environment.

Progressive Curriculum: Our program is structured to help kids build their skills step by step, from foundational movements to advanced techniques. We use a clear progression system to keep students motivated, engaged, and excited to achieve their next milestones.

Positive Environment: At our academy, every child matters. We foster an inclusive community where kids of all ages, sizes, and skill levels feel welcomed and supported. We focus on building friendships and teamwork alongside technical skills.

Safe and Clean Facility: The safety and well-being of our students are a top priority. Our academy is equipped with high-quality mats, and we adhere to rigorous hygiene standards to provide a clean and secure training space.
